RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Special Weight Purse 24300. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ALFIO tracked three wide early, rallied on the far turn and drew close, drew off late under left handed urging. WAITES KINGDOM dueled on the lead until mid stretch, could not match strides late with the winner but was clearly second best. ANCIENT MAN was allowed to settle early, went evenly in the stretch and was no threat to the top two. ZINFATUATION had good position on the inside and lacked a late response. BON DEUX dueled on the early lead and tired on the far turn. BLUNDER was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Zinfatuation
ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position on the inside and lacked late response,

ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled on the lead until mid stretch, could not match strides lat

ENTRY.COMMENT: was outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Ancient Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: was allowed to settle early, went evenly in the stretch and was n

ENTRY.NAME: Bon Deux
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled on the early lead and tired on the far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 15400. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Re gistered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BOURBON SOCIAL dueled early, shook clear on the turn, widened under a strong hand ride to win as much the best. LUCKY TO HAVE ME was unhurried early, rallied on the inside and was up for place. WHOVILLE chased the winner throughout and weakened slightly. GO STELLAIRE allowed to settle early, swung five wide in the stretch and was no threat. BLACK BUTTE raced four wide and was no menace. ACT LIKE A LADY allowed to settle, failed to menace. FASHION FRAME dueled early and was through after a half. KAY BEE GEE well placed early on the inside, faded in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Act Like a Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Kay Bee Gee
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed early on the inside, faded in the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Whoville
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the winner and weakened slightly

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Social
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early, shook clear on the turn, widened to win

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky to Have Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: was unhurried early, rallied on the inside and was up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Go Stellaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, swung five wide and was no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Fashion Frame
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled early and was through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Black Butte
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced four wide and was no menace

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Claiming Purse 13800. FOR MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KHOPILOT set the pace and was well rated on the front, remained clear in mid stretch, dug in gamely late and prevailed. ONE FOR THE MONEY was unhurried early on the inside, angled out four wide on the far turn, closed willingly and just missed. INSACIABLE PRINCE was allowed to settle early, rallied on the far turn three wide and drew close, then went evenly in the stretch. UNCLE DICK was slow early and trailed, improved on the inside while no threat. SHEA D CAPTURE raced close up for three quarters, then gave way in the stretch. MY TWO AUNT JOANS contended for three quarters, then came up empty. BAYTOWN BEAVER pressed the pace for five eights, then tired on the far turn. AWESOME BREAK had good position on the inside and was through after a half.

ENTRY.COMMENT: had good position on the inside and was through after half,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 37. Maiden Claiming Purse 19500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED MAIDENS, THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUNCHATTHELIZARD was away alertly and quickly made the lead, led throughout and widened to win as much the best. CANTRUNWITHBIGDOGS was never far back, rallied four wide in the stretch and was second best. OXBOW'S RIDE allowed to settle early, had a mild bid on the inside. DANES HEART raced mid pack four wide and was no threat. A K A FIBBER MCGEE chased the winner and weakened in the stretch. ALDUIN raced mid pack and was no threat. ROUGE TU RICHES was outrun. MARK'S BUDDY JACIN raced close up early and was through after a half. NEW YORK MIRACLE was outrun. TIME CHANGED UPON REVIEW.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MAHONING VALLEY RACE COURSE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 21600. FOR REGISTERED OHIO BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE OCTOBER 16. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since January 16 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RAINBOW SHIP had good position early, rallied five wide in the stretch, drew clear late under firm handling. PENNY SHOTS raced mid pack early, rallied six wide in the stretch and was second best. WHERETHERE'SSMOKE dueled early, shook clear on the turn, remained clear in mid stretch and was caught late. BISCAYNE BAY was allowed to settle early, closed a gap on the inside. GRIZABELLA raced mid pack and went evenly. GAIL'S DANCER raced five wide and was no menace. SHEZA FINE JUSTICE was unhurried early and no factor late. SARAH JANE vied for the lead, and tired in mid stretch. BAY MAGIC was no threat. DIVA POWER raced close up for a half then weakened in the lane. BOOGIE BOOGEE had brief foot, on the inside and gave way.

KERRI'S MIRACLE dueled early, shook clear on the turn, remained clear in mid stretch and was caught late. BEAUTIFUL LASS raced mid pack early, rallied three wide and closed willingly.
